description: Chat with your bot using ChatGPT!
install_msg:
To get started, install the OpenAI API: `[p]pipinstall openai` 
Then set the OpenAI API key with `[p]set api openai api_key,<your API key>`
You can chat with your bot by mentioning them or replying to them. The bot holds conversation history with users individually, which can be reset using commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the content of messages that mention or reply to the bot for use of ChatGPT being able to retain conversation history.
name: ChatGPT
short: Chat with your bot using ChatGPT!
